name: Machu Picchu Saga
description:
Try to collect the treasure of Machu Picchu with your favorite explorer. Get ready for a journey full of traps in mystical tropical forest with its inhabitants, Maya people! Play this awesome, endless, and addictive game. Make sure you beat your friends.

Collect as many coins as possible. With them you can buy different power-ups and add-ons. Your main goal is to avoid falling into water by landing on ancient pillars. You can take a brake on each landing, but not for long.

You will be amazed by the extraordinary graphics, original sounds, music, and the addictive effect of this game.

Features include:

- simple single-tap gameplay
- different characters
- different add-ons for character
- amazing graphics
- awesome power-ups
- original sound and music
- your high score
- custom, high-definition graphics for iPad
- post scores on Facebook

Purchase this game today! Thanks for playing!
